com.software.reuze

Class gb_a_StrategySubdivision

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_a_StrategySubdivision
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    gb_StrategySubdivisionDisplacement, gb_StrategySubdivisionDual, gb_StrategySubdivisionDualDisplacement, gb_StrategySubdivisionMidpoint, gb_StrategySubdivisionTri

    public abstract class gb_a_StrategySubdivision
extends Object
    This is the abstract parent class for all subdivision strategies. Each of its implementations defines a concrete solution to split a single edge of a gb_WETriangleMesh.

      • getEdgeOrdering

        public Comparator<? super gb_WEWingedEdge> getEdgeOrdering()
        Returns the Comparator used to sort a mesh's edge list based on a certain criteria. By default the gb_EdgeLengthComparator is used.
        Returns:
        edge comparator
